main.name: Uttamkumar Tarasariya
main.description: Android && React Native Developer by Day, Freelance, Founder && Project Manager by Night
main.bio: Uttamkumar, Mobile Engineer, considers himself as the best reader. Uttam had been working at PlanetX Technologies Pvt. Ltd. as a Mobile developer and currently he is a full-time Freelancer working in React Native technology and Managing Projects. Moreover, Uttam is dreaming to be becoming AI Engineer and pursuing his dream by educating at LOYALIST COLLEGE OF APPLIED ARTS AND TECHNOLOGY with course of ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND DATA SCIENCE
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details

testimonials.text: Very responsible, the most preferable for long term.

Uttam has successfully delivered an online store using ReactJs,MongoDb, and NodeJs. He was able to listen and apply any updates or changes to the website. I was happy working with him and I would definitely recommend him!
Great developer to work with. Very professional and time sensitive. I will keep working with him for long term!
He is nice and knew what he was doing.

Uttam has done an excellent job. He offered me a solution for my project and fulfilled his task perfectly. He did even more and showed a lot of patience regarding my requirements. I am already preparing the next tasks. This developer is highly recommended.
